entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
